humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that one out of two lymph nodes is positive for metastatic carcinoma (1/2). This corresponds to the N1 stage, as per Rule 12 (N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes).

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that one out of two lymph nodes is positive for metastatic carcinoma, with the largest focus in the lymph node being 2.5 mm. This corresponds to a pathologic N stage of N1a (pN1a) in the TNM staging system.
